name: screen-share
description: Mirror your device to any computer screen any time

scripts.activcast:watch: npm run activcast:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=activcast webpack --progress --env.umd --watch
scripts.activcast:build: npm run activcast:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=activcast webpack --progress --env.umd --env.production --env.minimize
scripts.activcast:dev: npm run activcast:clean && cross-env NODE_MODULE=activcast webpack --progress --env.umd --env.production --env.nodevtool
scripts.dev: npm run activcast:dev && cross-env NODE_MODE=dev node src/activ-cast/locales/archiver.ts --env.dev
scripts.reinstall: npm install rimraf && rimraf node_modules/* && npm install
scripts.rebuild: npm run reinstall && npm run build
scripts.rebuild-dev: npm run reinstall && npm run dev

author: ND CZQ
